page.title: 11Population in Wash Common
page.content: I surveyed three classes and found that only 10 children were born in Newbury.Nearly one third of the children surveyed had moved in the last year,many of them from Thatcham where there is a lot of new building and people think it is getting too crowed.Some people moved within Newbury from other parts of Berkshire but some came from further away.Last year 147 children moved into our area and started our school and 16 moved away.Out of a class of 33 only 3 children had no relations in Newbury.19 had Aunts and Uncles living locally and 1 Chinese girl had all 30 ofher relations living in Wash Common.From last September 29 rising five year olds started our school.
